stochastic_function: lambda field_choice, exam_performance: {1:0.7,0:0.2,-1:0.1} if field_choice == 'science' and exam_performance == 'excellent' else {1:0.4,0:0.4,-1:0.2} if field_choice == 'science' and exam_performance == 'good' else {1:0.2,0:0.5,-1:0.3} if field_choice == 'science' and exam_performance == 'average' else {1:0.55,0:0.3,-1:0.15} if field_choice == 'arts' and exam_performance == 'excellent' else {1:0.35,0:0.4,-1:0.25} if field_choice == 'arts' and exam_performance == 'good' else {1:0.15,0:0.5,-1:0.35}
lambda job_prospects: {1:0.8,0:0.2,-1:0.0} if job_prospects == 1 else {1:0.4,0:0.5,-1:0.1} if job_prospects == 0 else {1:0.1,0:0.4,-1:0.5}
